1.title: Let's Get Fried Chicken!
1.plot: Chef Lawrence has a mysterious new plan to elevate the Pink Tea Cup. He tries to win his family back but Ana explodes over his affair with Thandi. A new hire causes chaos, Sana schemes to get Candice back & the twins hatch a secret plan.

2.title: The HBIC Is Back
2.plot: Lawrence apologizes to Candice, but on terms she may not accept. Ana shocks all when she returns to the Pink Tea Cup to take back her spot and her man from Thandi. Lawrence's mysterious plans are revealed.

3.title: Party Crasher
3.plot: When their tension-fueled sit-down goes wrong Ana takes down Candice. Cola draws a battle line when her boyfriend flirts with Sana. Someone crashes Lawrence's all-important Miami investor party and he erupts in an epic meltdown.

4.title: Dinner Party Disaster
4.plot: Dinner from hell; Candice and LP face off. Cola and her boyfriend cause drama at the restaurant.

5.title: Winner Winner Chicken Diner
5.plot: Ana fights to save LP's dream; Staff competes for sous chef title; Cola confesses to Jon Jon.

6.title: Miami Mayhem
6.plot: The staff parties in Miami, but an uninvited guest and a pool fight threatens Lawrence's Miami dream.

7.title: Iron Fork in the Road
7.plot: Lawrence's confession backfires when Ana freaks out. A shocking staff firing shakes up the team and divides loyalties. Candice drops a bombshell about a threesome with Lawrence and Ana.

8.title: A Chicken and Waffle House Divided
8.plot: Lawrence & Ana's engagement is off to a rocky start. Ana confronts Thandi over a Miami hookup with her man. Fists fly at the twins' fashion show. A secret alliance plots revenge to take down the Pink Tea Cup.

1.title: Girls Just Wanna Eat Some Chicken!
1.plot: Chef Lawrence's mission to elevate soul food is thwarted by his flirtatious ways with his bartender Candice. His girlfriend and general manager Ana is jealous and her plans to punish Candice get out of control.

2.title: Five Stars of Shade
2.plot: Lawrence brings his staff to a fine dining restaurant to step up their game, but they are a hot mess! Past tensions ignite between the staff; Candice is left off the invite list. Ana's evil plan backfires.

3.title: The Mother of All Breakdowns
3.plot: As the PTC prepares for Mother's Day brunch, their biggest day of the year, Ana hires a new bartender to spite Candice. Tensions between the staff, and kitchen confusion, cause the Mother of all Meltdowns.

4.title: Wine & Dine & Grind
4.plot: A sexy and fun trip to a winery takes a dark turn when Candice is overcome with jealousy over Lawrence's flirtation with Sana. The Twins' big delivery to a radio show may be a huge fail.

5.title: More Beef
5.plot: Lawrence is understaffed and stressed for an important food critic's visit. Shocking accusations -and wine glasses-fly at a disastrous staff meeting, and the future of the PTC is on the line.

6.title: The Worst Staff Meeting Ever
6.plot: Lawrence is understaffed and stressed for a food critic's visit. Shocking accusations fly at a disastrous staff meeting; the PTC's future is at risk.

-1.title: Today's Menu: More Beef
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Hustle and Soul is a one-hour six-episode series from Big Fish Entertainment, following Chef Lawrence Page, owner and head chef of The Pink Tea Cup (PTC) restaurant. Lawrence resurrected the former West Village landmark and moved to the Fort Greene, Brooklyn on his quest to rise to the next level and score a coveted Michelin star. While Lawrence struggles to find the perfect recipe for success, he and his team will learn that it takes more than just good cooking and a good-looking staff to become Michelin elite. Heading up The Pink Tea Cup crew as General Manager is Lawrence's hot-tempered girlfriend Ana; including Sana, the flighty flirty hostess who is not afraid to stand up to Ana and go after everything she wants; Thandi, the PTC's lead server who is next in line to move up; and Candice, the head bartender who is as sweet as her drinks, but far from Michelin ready. The twins, Dominic and Stef, provide some much-needed comic relief at the restaurant where they can't seem to get anything right.
